channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Electricals bin, 1st November
item.description:
As usual this is overflowing. It is not a solution to anything and just creates fly tipping and mess. Please reconsider its existence. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junk on pavement, 1st November
item.description:
This area has become a dumping ground masquerading as community recycling. It is always littered and ends up down the street along with the rotting flowers/plastic strapped to the tree and the junk from the barbers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell New Road, Camberwell, London

item.title: Gap in fence, 1st November
item.description:
There's a pole missing. People come in and out through this gap. It's been like this for so long there's actually a path worn in the grass between the gap and the path 5 yards away. I vaguely rememebr reporting this about 5 years ago. What's the point?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queen Elizabeths Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
